attributes.title: my donkey ate homwork on this app
attributes.review: so i downloaded this app and my life went to hell . its like the app summons demons . i walk outside and a hawk laid eggs in my hair but why i tried to move it scratched the hell out of my eyes . and now i cant see. this app is TERRIBLE i wouldnt recommend this to anyone . not even my worst enemy. but as soon as i deleted the app my life went back to normal . even if i am still left with one eye.

attributes.title: This app is so bad
attributes.review: I download this app to keep tads on the President. But when I got on the app it started tho leak my phone number out to to weird websites. It started to send me pictures of people in the nude and it disgusted me I can never unsee those pictures. I still am getting those pictures NOW!. I hate this app and I can never see anyone what wants those pics if they want got this app.

attributes.title: God will kill those who download this app
attributes.review: Just about the worst creation since musically. My phone started shooting out electricity once I downloaded this app and then my phone burst into flames! DO NOT I REPEAT DO NOT DOWNLOAD. It erased all my data and I’ve lost everything. I think this is a message from God that if we support this orange Oompa Loompa we will be sent straight to the burning flames of the underworld. You have been warned

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD

attributes.title: Absolutely Terrible!!!!
attributes.review: HIGHLY DO NOT RECOMMEND!!! This makes your phone super slow and leaves all types of bugs and viruses on it. I just downloaded it and now wherever I go on my phone, there’s some type of annoying pop up! Just don’t do it for you and your phones safety. I absolutely don’t trust this app at all. They need to try again. Or don’t. This is ridiculous 👁👄👁

attributes.title: HORRIBLE, TERRIBLE APP
attributes.review: This app will steal you house and car. My dinosaur went to go get me Hooters, and I, as Jesus, was riding him and when we came back we no longer legally owned our house and car and my lawyer, Judge Llamma, said that it was because of this app. I had everything but my phone in those things, and now I have nothing because I was dumb enough to get this app. Thank you for your time.

attributes.title: VERY BAD APP
attributes.review: This app took about half of my space and it’s worth the space, there is so many glitches with this app, I try going in but it kicks me out immediately. I try to close the app but it keeps me stuck on freeze. This app is not worth my time. I hate this app. I can’t even look around the app cuz it takes hours just to loads.🥱 This is 🙈USELESS🙈. I REPEAT IT IS ✨USELESS✨ and will waste your ‼️TIME‼️🤡

attributes.title: HORIBBLE
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to read the lies it says about our awful president. My phone and I are now traumatized. The second I opened the app, it relocated me to a website where a video of trump played. I then started getting alerts that my phone had a virus. My phone suddenly started shaking and exploded, leaving a huge cloud of smoke. Trump emerged out of the cloud.... oh wait, my sister just spilled a bag of Cheetos.

attributes.title: A nightmare
attributes.review: Terrible app. I opened the app and a robot went on my screen hacked my phone and my photos were deleted and replaced with curses pictures of Dora. Then the app shattered my screen and wouldn’t stop playing nickel back. I couldn’t turn it off, I tired to burn the phone and the music was still blasting. I ended up sending it off to space with my pet dinosaur who is deaf.

attributes.title: my phone wouldnt stop glitching!
attributes.review: terrible app!! i would never recommend this to anyone, my phone would glitch anytime I opened it and it made everything run so incredibly slow!! I couldnt stop the messages as well and it made my phone glitch even worse then before!! please don’t download this unless youre looking into breaking your phone!!
